page.title: 15LEISURE AND SOCIAL LIFE
page.content: From our survey in the Gildersome,New Farnley,Lower Wortley areas we found that the pub or social club was a main feature in the social life of local people.33.75% of all people polled visited a pub or club on a regular weekly basis,38.75% occasionally, 2.5% monthly,25% never.The social club proved to be extremely popular with most people compared to the higher price pubs. Cinema attendance was with 0% of people polled visiting a cinema weekly,2.5% monthly, 65% occas ionally;32.5% never.We felt that the introduction of home video has had an effect on cinema attendance. Theatre visits: 0% attended weekly,2.5% monthly,48.75% occasionally and 48.75% never.The main theatre venues for the area are found in the centre of Leeds and Bradford.There were also local drama groups.
